description.line1: Ready to take your game to the next level? Discover top farming guides, progression tips, efficient builds, and tactics to climb elo like a pro.
description.line2: Play at your own pace, but strategically.

services.title: Power-Up Services
services.description: Every player needs that extra boost to reach their full potential. Our Power-Up Services are designed to give you the tools, support, and strategy you need to become a legend with the help of LastHit-Legends.

servicesData.title: Smart Tips
servicesData.description: Key advice to save you time and unnecessary clicks.

servicesData.title: Express Guide
servicesData.description: The essentials to improve without getting lost in endless tutorials.

servicesData.title: Auto Improvement
servicesData.description: Use our tips to level up effortlessly.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We created a platform designed for players who truly want to improve. You won’t find endless guides or mindless grinding here—we provide exercises, tips, and challenges that genuinely help you farm better, level up, and understand the game step by step.

purpose.title: Mission
purpose.description: Make improving at League of Legends easy, fun, and accessible to everyone.

purpose.title: Vision
purpose.description: Become the number one platform for learning key mechanics like farming.

cta.title: Conquer the Rift
cta.description: Conquer Summoner’s Rift with tools designed to improve your performance. Learn, practice, and progress game after game.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.description: Choose the plan that will make you a Rift master, summoner.
pricing.cta: Boost your game from the lobby

free.title: Free
free.feature1: Basic access to farming guides and general tips

pro.title: Pro
pro.feature2: Full access to champion stats and data

elite.title: Elite
elite.feature3: Real-time alerts to improve farming and positioning
